title: Is there a way to attach x86dbg with ida pro?
content: IDA has the option to use debuggers but the debuggers are quite limited. Is there a way that I can use to use x86dbg with IDA Pro?

comments.text: have u seen this tutorial? disassemble.blog/2018/07/13/â€¦

answers_data.content: Take a look at x64dbgida, this is a plugin for IDA Pro.
